language.entry: The Seer's equipment is infused by the moon's light. She is able to speak to the dead and control her own spirit. She can kill, weaken, heal wounds, empower and calm the spirit of her companions. She might be blind but she still sees more than we can.
A group only needs one seer.

Unstable but usually reliable, the Seer is a dark moon priest that uses her own spirit to amplify her power. As a user of moon magic, she is unable to cause critical damage, however she can multicast her spells and some of them are so powerful that she can end up stunning herself, if she doesn't increase her resilience with her other spells.
Sometimes I feel bad for her, talking to the dead and all.
I have seen our future, everything will be alright.
Do not worry, we will survive.
Get up and fight, nothing can stop you as long as I'm here.
The moon shall keep you safe.
Spirits of our ancestors, protect me!
I got you in my sight!
Something is creeping up on us.
I cannot take much more of this.
I should unleash all of my power!
I will make sure we all survive!
The future is supposed to be mine.
I'm not waiting to die here.
You want to kill me? Go ahead!
I will make things easier for them.
I cannot die, I know how this ends.
The moon protects me, there is no way they can harm me.
I've seen the future and they are not in it!
If I stay here, this won't end well.
I need some time to focus.
We should stop all this fighting.
I should let them end us.
I need some time to think.
We are not supposed to fight here.
I'm not supposed to participate in this fight.
I've seen this, that is not a good idea.
I shouldnt, it might affect our future.
No, this is supposed to happen!
I will do what I need to!
I know what I'm supposed to do.
I've seen this before, this is what needs to happen!
No, I will do what I have to!
That is not what needs to happen!
I can't, I have to do this instead.
We are not supposed to fight...
I refuse, my will is the will of the future.
This is good, I'm supposed to be afraid.
I'm not supposed to be afraid.
I cannot wait for our next battle.
Why is this taking so long?
All of you need to focus, we are not supposed to be here.
Without my magic you all wouldn't be able to fight.
I'm not supposed to keep us safe!
I've seen what happens, it's not pretty.
This venture will not end well.
I've spoke to the celestials, they will not help us.
Our future journey will not be easy.
Hurt me more, if you dare.
I've never felt so alive before!
Maybe he is right, maybe I should embrace the darkness.
My spirit will save us all!
That was not supposed to happen.
How did I not see that coming?
Why havent I been warned about this?
We are not supposed to retreat.
We are supposed to perish here.
Celestials do not allow us to leave.
We are about to be surrounded.
They are coming for us all.
The moon will protect us from this evil!
They are going to ambush us.
I know what is about to happen!
No! You are not supposed to attack!
They are about to end us.
Dodging is good for you, you should try it.
All of this is very suspicious.
How did I not see that?!
This is not supposed to happen.
They are about to ambush us.
Don't stop, stay on the move.
That is not supposed to happen.
I refuse, that doesn't happen in our future.
That is not supposed to happen.
The celestials do not allow it.
That is not the way of us seers.
I never did that, so I shouldn't.
They are waiting for it, so no.
They will retaliate, not a good idea.
Do I look like I need healing?
My spirit does not like that.
Our end is near, no need to heal.
The moon will heal me, I do not need that.
In the future I didn't heal so I don't need that.
This shouldnt happen, so it won't.
Is that really what needs to happen?
Only the moon is allowed to do that.
Ethereal magic is the only magic I need.
I will not fall to the darkness...
Celestials bless me in this dark hour.
As it was foreseen, the end is near...
We are not supposed to be here.
If we do not leave, we perish.
I can feel the presence of something...
I cannot wait until our next battle.
I hope we continue our journey shortly.
There must always be a witch queen.
I can hear the souls whisper.
Our journey will not end well.
We need to let it go, the celestial magic will save us.
I hope we don't get ambushed here.
Pain is the only thing that I crave right now.
Why are you all so weak?
Where are the celestials now when I need them.
Maybe starving was the way to go...
I don't think this food will give me strength.
This didn't happen the first time around.

The Seer's equipment is infused by the moon's light. She is able to speak to the dead and control her own spirit. She can kill, weaken, heal wounds, empower and calm the spirit of her companions. She might be blind but she still sees more than we can.
A group only needs one seer.

Unstable but usually reliable, the Seer is a dark moon priest that uses her own spirit to amplify her power. A group only needs one seer.

Unstable but usually reliable, the Seer is a dark moon priest that uses her own spirit to amplify her power. As a user of moon magic, she is unable to cause critical damage, however she can multicast her spells and some of them are so powerful that she can end up stunning herself, if she doesn't increase her resilience with her other spells.
Sometimes I feel bad for her, talking to the dead and all.
I have seen our future, everything will be alright.
Do not worry, we will survive.
Get up and fight, nothing can stop you as long as I'm here.
The moon shall keep you safe.
Spirits of our ancestors, protect me!
I got you in my sight!
Something is creeping up on us.
I cannot take much more of this.
I should unleash all of my power!
I will make sure we all survive!
The future is supposed to be mine.
I'm not waiting to die here.
You want to kill me? Go ahead!
I will make things easier for them.
I cannot die, I know how this ends.
The moon protects me, there is no way they can harm me.
I've seen the future and they are not in it!
If I stay here, this won't end well.
I need some time to focus.
We should stop all this fighting.
I should let them end us.
I need some time to think.
We are not supposed to fight here.
I'm not supposed to participate in this fight.
I've seen this, that is not a good idea.
I shouldnt, it might affect our future.
No, this is supposed to happen!
I will do what I need to!
I know what I'm supposed to do.
I've seen this before, this is what needs to happen!
No, I will do what I have to!
That is not what needs to happen!
I can't, I have to do this instead.
We are not supposed to fight...
I refuse, my will is the will of the future.
This is good, I'm supposed to be afraid.
I'm not supposed to be afraid.
I cannot wait for our next battle.
Why is this taking so long?
All of you need to focus, we are not supposed to be here.
Without my magic you all wouldn't be able to fight.
I'm not supposed to keep us safe!
I've seen what happens, it's not pretty.
This venture will not end well.
I've spoke to the celestials, they will not help us.
Our future journey will not be easy.
Hurt me more, if you dare.
I've never felt so alive before!
Maybe he is right, maybe I should embrace the darkness.
My spirit will save us all!
That was not supposed to happen.
How did I not see that coming?
Why havent I been warned about this?
We are not supposed to retreat.
We are supposed to perish here.
Celestials do not allow us to leave.
We are about to be surrounded.
They are coming for us all.
The moon will protect us from this evil!
They are going to ambush us.
I know what is about to happen!
No! You are not supposed to attack!
They are about to end us.
Dodging is good for you, you should try it.
All of this is very suspicious.
How did I not see that?!
This is not supposed to happen.
They are about to ambush us.
Don't stop, stay on the move.
That is not supposed to happen.
I refuse, that doesn't happen in our future.
That is not supposed to happen.
The celestials do not allow it.
That is not the way of us seers.
I never did that, so I shouldn't.
They are waiting for it, so no.
They will retaliate, not a good idea.
Do I look like I need healing?
My spirit does not like that.
Our end is near, no need to heal.
The moon will heal me, I do not need that.
In the future I didn't heal so I don't need that.
This shouldnt happen, so it won't.
Is that really what needs to happen?
Only the moon is allowed to do that.
Ethereal magic is the only magic I need.
I will not fall to the darkness...
Celestials bless me in this dark hour.
As it was foreseen, the end is near...
We are not supposed to be here.
If we do not leave, we perish.
I can feel the presence of something...
I cannot wait until our next battle.
I hope we continue our journey shortly.
There must always be a witch queen.
I can hear the souls whisper.
Our journey will not end well.
We need to let it go, the celestial magic will save us.
I hope we don't get ambushed here.
Pain is the only thing that I crave right now.
Why are you all so weak?
Where are the celestials now when I need them.
Maybe starving was the way to go...
I don't think this food will give me strength.
This didn't happen the first time around.

El equipamiento de la vidente es infundido por la luz de la luna. Ella es capaz de hablar con los muertos y controlar su propio espritu. Ella puede matar, debilitar, curar heridas, potenciar y calmar el espritu de sus compaeros. Ella puede ser ciega, pero an as puede ver cosas que los demas no.
El grupo slo necesita una vidente.

Inestable pero generalmente confiable, la vidente es una sacerdotisa de luna oscura que utiliza su propio espritu para amplificar su poder. Como un usuario de la magia de la luna, ella es incapaz de causar dao crtico, sin embargo ella puede multidifundir sus hechizos y algunos de ellos son tan poderosos que ella puede acabar sorprendindose, si no aumenta su resistencia con sus otros hechizos.
A veces me siento mal por ella, hablando con los muertos y todo.
Te da una herencia al azar
Tu deseo es una orden para m.
He visto nuestro futuro, todo va a estar bien.
Levntate y lucha, nada puede detenerte mientras yo est aqu.
La luna te mantendr a salvo.
Abrace la luz de la luna!
Yo se lo que esta pasando.
No puedo tomar mucho ms de esto.
Me asegurar de que todos sobrevivamos!
Se supone que el futuro es mo.
No estoy esperando a morir aqu.
Har las cosas ms fciles para ellos.
No puedo morir, s cmo termina esto.
La luna me protege, no hay forma de que me puedan hacer dao.
He visto el futuro y no estis en l!
Si me quedo aqu, esto no terminar bien.
Debera dejar que acabaran con nosotros.
La muerte no es tan mala.
No estoy obligada a participar en esto.
Ya lo he visto antes, no es una buena idea.
No debera, podra afectar nuestro futuro.
S lo que se supone que tengo que hacer.
He visto esto antes, esto es lo que tiene que suceder!
No, voy a hacer lo que tengo que hacer!
Eso no es lo que tiene que suceder!
No puedo, tengo que hacer esto en su lugar.
Eso no es lo que hice...
Me niego, mi voluntad es la voluntad del futuro.
Esto es bueno, se supone que tengo miedo.
Se supone que no tengo miedo.
No puedo esperar para nuestra prxima batalla.
Todos ustedes necesitan enfocarse, no se supone que estamos aqu.
Sin mi magia no todos seran capaces de luchar.
No debo que debemos manteneros a salvo.!
He visto lo que pasa, no es bonito.
He hablado con los celestiales, no nos ayudarn.
Nuestro futuro viaje no ser fcil.
Vuelve a tocarme, si te atreves.
Nunca me he sentido tan viva antes!
Tal vez tiene razn, tal vez debera abrazar la oscuridad.
Mi espritu nos salvar a todos!
Por qu no me han avisado sobre esto?
Mis visiones se estn volviendo inexactas!
No podemos escapar de nuestro destino.
Se supone que debemos perecer aqu.
Los celestiales no nos permiten irnos.
Estamos a punto de ser rodeados.
La Luna nos proteger del mal!
S lo que est a punto de pasar!
No! Se supona que no tenas que atacar!
O empezamos a pelear, o nos retiramos ya!
La magia etrea nos dar poder!
Es el futuro el que tiene nuestra muerte.
Estn a punto de acabar con nosotros.
Bate en la luz de la Luna!
Eso no es lo que se supone que pasar.
Estn a punto de hacernos una emboscada.
Eso no es lo que se supone que pasar.
Me niego. No es eso lo que pasa en nuestro futuro.
Eso no es lo que se supone que pasar.
Ese no es el camino que he.
Nunca hice esto, as que no debera.
Es lo que esperan, as que no.
Contraatacarn. No es una buena idea.
A mi espritu eso no le gusta.
El final se acerca, no necesitamos sanar.
La Luna me curar, as que no necesito eso.
En el futuro no he sanado as que no necesito eso.
Esto no debera suceder, as que no lo har.
Realmente es eso lo que tiene que suceder?
Slo a la Luna se le permite hacer eso.
La magia etrea es la nica magia que necesito.
Los celestiales me bendicen en esta hora tan oscura.
Abraza la luz de la luna.
Como estaba previsto, el fin est cerca...
No puedo esperar a nuestra siguiente pelea.
Espero que prosigamos nuestro viaje en breve.
Eso es todo lo que tienes?
Siempre debe haber una reina bruja.
Esto est poniendo a prueba mi paciencia.
Debemos dejarlo estar. La magia celestial nos salvar.
Espero que no nos embosquen aqu.
El dolor es lo nico que anhelo ahora mismo.
Por qu sois todos tan flojuchos?
Eso no lo voy a aceptar!
Dnde estn los celestiales cuando se les necesita.
Quizs el hambre es una buena opcin...
No creo que esto vaya a darme fuerzas.
Esto no ocurri la primera vez.

Bro Wyroczni zaklta jest magi ksiyca. Potrafi ona rozmawia z umarymi I kontrolowa wasnego ducha, jak rwnie zabija, osabia, leczy lub wzmacnia innych zaklinajc ich dusze. Nie daj zwie si jej lepocie, ona widzi wicej ni ktokolwiek.

Niestabilna lecz skuteczna, Wyrocznia jest kapank ksiyca ktra zaklina wasn dusz by zwikszy sw moc. Mistyczna aura ksiyca nie pozwala jej zadawa obrae krytycznych, ale sprawia, e jej zaklcia maj szanse ulec zwielokrotnieniu, cho cz z nich jest tak potna e mog j oguszy jeeli uprzednio si nie przygotuje.
Czasami wspczuj jej tego, e syszy co mwi umarli.
Widziaam nasz przyszo, wszystko bdzie dobrze.
Wstawaj I walcz, nic ci nie powstrzyma dopuki masz mnie u swego boku.
A wic tak to si zakoczy.
Ten bl jest nie do zniesienia!
Przecie przyszo miaa naleec do mnie.
Trzymajcie ich z dala ode mnie!
Nie bd tu sta a mnie zabij.
Jak chcesz mnie zabi to dawaj!
Nie mog umrzec, wiem e przeyj.
Ksiyc mnie chroni, nie bd w stanie mnie zrani.
Widziaam przyszo, w ktrej ich nie ma!
Jeeli tu zostan, to nie skoczy si dobrze.
Nie powinnam bra udziau w tej walce.
Wiem co planujesz I to nie jest dobry pomys.
Na prawd nie powinnam tego robi.
Nie, to si nie miao wydarzy!
Byam tu ju, to musi si wydarzy!
Nie, bdz robi to co musz!
To nie to powinno si sta!
W ogle nie powinnimy teraz walczy...
Odmawiam, ma wola jest nasz przyszoci.
To nie moe by nic dobrego.
Nie mog doczeka si kolejnej bitwy.
Skupcie si wszyscy, nie powinnimy tu w ogle by.
Bez mej magii nie bylibycie w stanie dalej walczy.
Wiem co nas czeka, nic przyjemnego.
Ta wyprawa nie skoczy si dobrze.
Nasza droga w krtce dobiegnie koca.
Rozmawiaam z duchami, odwrciy si od nas.
Zracie mnie bardziej, jeli si omielicie!
Nigdy nie czuam si tak ywa!
A jeli ma racj, moe powinnam zaakceptowa mrok.
Dlaczego nie zostaam przed tym ostrzeona?
Ksiyc uchroni nas przed tym zem!
Trzymajcie si z dala ode mnie!
Zacznij walczy albo bierz nogi za pas!
Unikanie atakw dobrze by ci zrobio, wiesz?
Nie zgadzam si tego nie ma w naszej przyszoci.
Po co w ogle si staramy?
Duchy nie wyraaj na to zgody.
Nigdy tego nie zrobiam, nie powinnam...
Czy ja wygldam jakbym potrzebowaa pomocy??
Nasz koniec jest bliski, nie ma sensu si leczy.
Ksiyc mnie uzdrowi, nie potrzebuj tego.
To nie powinno si sta, wic si nie stanie.
Czy to aby na pewno powinno si wydarzy?
Nie moesz mnie po prostu zignorowa?
Magia eteru to wszystko czego potrzebuj.
Tak jak to byo przewidziane, koniec jest blisko...
Jeli nie odejdziemy to po nas.
Obymy ruszyli w drog jak najszybciej.
Gwiazy nas ocal, jeli tylko przestaniemy walczy.
Gdzie s duchy kiedy ich potrzebuj.
Nic nie da mi siy, nawet posiek.

The Seer's equipment is infused by the moon's light. She is able to speak to the dead and control her own spirit. She can kill, weaken, heal wounds, empower and calm the spirit of her companions. She might be blind but she still sees more than we can.
A group only needs one seer.

Unstable but usually reliable, the Seer is a dark moon priest that uses her own spirit to amplify her power. As a user of moon magic, she is unable to cause critical damage, however she can multicast her spells and some of them are so powerful that she can end up stunning herself, if she doesn't increase her resilience with her other spells.
